subtitle: Page not found
description: Looks like this route did a `git checkout` to another dimension.
terminal: bash: cd: /the-page-you-wanted: No such file or directory
e404bad fix: remove page nobody was using
tips: Check if the URL is correct (typos happen even to seniors)
The page might have been moved or deleted
Or maybe it never existed... like that bug that only happens on Fridays
funFacts: Fun fact: The 404 status came from CERN — room 404 housed the original web server.
Fun fact: This portfolio has more lines of code than 404 pages.
Pro tip: Ctrl+Z doesn't work on URLs. We've tried.

meta.title: 404 — Page not found
meta.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been removed. Explore the portfolio, implementations, and guides available.
meta.ogDescription: Oops! This route made a git checkout to another dimension. Return to the portfolio and explore the content.
